@pavan159 It depends on your monitor resolution.  If you're running 1920x1080, you'll want at least a Radeon 6870 or GTX 560ti.  Those would be the minimum if you're a hardcore gamer.  If you have a  lower resolution, however, (About 1280x1024-1440x900) then a cheaper graphics card like the ones I mentioned would suit your needs.
